Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text:
We've been coming here every Trip to the Netherlands.. great service , great bagels.. what more do you need..( great views as well)
Bagels with warm ham, and lovely coffee.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Spacious place with views on the Amsterdam canal/river. Service is correct, the products are a bit overpriced but that is to be expected in this location. I do not like all of their food and drinks so I have to be careful what I choose to ‚Ä¶

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Amazing view. The interior is one of the best Bagels&Beans i've seen. Lots of space for larger groups and the size of the location doesn't make it feel crowded. My latte was made beautifully. I was unaware that they made things other than ‚Ä¶

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Although I only had a cappuccino, it was very large and tasted great for 4.10‚Ç¨. The food menu (available in English) looked intriguing and I plan to return for breakfast.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Many unique items on the menu. Staff are friendly!

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Amazing place, unbelievable vegan options, and such friendly staff!

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Lovely place to stay longer for reading or working. Food and coffee really good.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Dont even think to have a breakfast here on Sunday - we couldn‚Äôt get 2 bagels in 50 minutes!

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: First time visit of this Bagels & Beans and loved it! Staff brings a glass of water as soon as you're seated, now that's customer service. The owner is very friendly and the location is perfect with a view on the water. The bagels and Tony's Chocolonely hot chocolate were very nice. I definitely recommend to have a break here.

Review Text: pretty good for a bagel and beans store

Review Text: My favorite local place for breakfast. Which they had earlier opening hours since it is a breakfast Cafe.

Review Text: Perfect taste of coffee, yummy deserts! and this cafe very child friendly (they have a little corner with toys for children). We love to go to this place. I am exactly recommend it to everyone!

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Nice place next to the harbor.  Free Wi-Fi,  good ambient light and views plus great cappuccino.

Name: Bagels & Beans

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Love the ice coffees and bagels!

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Cosy and delicious breakfast and lunch place. You can work, read and relax here. Friendly staff, diverse, fresh, healthy (if you want) and delicious food and drinks. ‚Ä¶

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: it's my usual coffee and chill out place.. the staff is great and super friendly and warm, dog friendly, kid friendly, great view away from the typical amsterdam tourist hustle and bustle. menu has a good choice of sweet and savory bagels, salads, yoghurt.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: One of the few Caf√®s that is open already at 8am. Friendly staff, good food and Caf√®. Even fresh orange juice with the good morning bagel.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Amazing music - classical and jazz, super friendly and professional staff, great food. Just watch out for plastic straws, they put them in your drink without asking!

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Very nice staff and nice coffee. View is nice too and they have some outside seating.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Loved this little place. Staff are really nice. It's well priced considering it's the best bagels iv ever had!!

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: The bagels were great and there is an overall cozy atmosphere. The staff were the highlight though, such nice people!

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Left my bag here and when i returned after 30 minutes they kept it safely behind the counter. Great customer service and food quality overall, solid 9/10

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Really good food coffees and tea. Service is excellent. Good place to work. And you can bring small kids

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: love this place! Had brunch a week ago here, was a very nice and relaxed atmosphere,  fresh drinks, definitely recommend!

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Good food and ambience. But service was super slow. We had to wait more than 40 mins to get our order. Staff seems a bit inefficient with not much clue of what is going on.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Good food for a good price, with a very nice outside seating area. Also has good vegan options.
